name: sunwallet-contracts
description: The smart contracts eco-system for Sun-Wallet application

scripts.ganache: ganache-cli --gas-price 0 -a 30 -i 5 --mnemonic genre dress knee lounge expose flash cute valid hard define box outdoor
scripts.flat: truffle-flattener contracts/UniswapV2Router02.sol > flat/UniswapV2Router02.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SunCoin.sol > flat/SunCoin.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/TokenVesting.sol > flat/TokenVesting.sol

author: Ararat Tonoyan
